hadiths.text: Narrated Jabir bin `Abdullah Al-Ansari:Allah's Messenger (ï·º) said, "Name yourselves after me (by my name) but do not call (yourselves) by my Kuniya (1), for I am Al-Qasim (distributor), and I distribute among you Allah's blessings." This narration has also come on the authority of Anas that the ! Prophet said so
